amendatorysection.catchline: State-owned vehicles; title in bureau; purchases; restrictions.
amendatorysection.para: Subject to section 81-1013, the bureau shall own and hold title, in the name of the State of Nebraska, to all state-owned vehicles. All purchases of state-owned vehicles and automotive equipment shall be made or approved by the bureau. The Director of Administrative Services shall not approve any voucher for the purchase of any passenger car unless submitted by the bureau.
